name: Penguins (Dave_Lemonade)
description:
Penguins are useless on their own.

Gather up the 128 Penguins and Lead the to the sea and press "F" to send them out to fish. When all Penguins are out to fish you have completed you task.

When a Penguin is following you can shoot it at an enemy or ice block.

You can't shoot Baby Penguins

Controls:

WASD or Directional Arrows: Movement

SPACE: Follow

E: Dismiss

MOUSE: Aim

LEFT CLICK: Shoot

F: Fish

Music from Marching Dream

marching dream - Asset Store (unity.com)

All other Art, SFX & Scripts created for this game.

for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
